name: Ice Hockey Strike
description:
Experience pure ice hockey fun with fast paced gameplay, astonishing atmosphere, stunning smooth animations, simple controls with insane action of hockey games. Fast pace action game where you have to dodge the opponent team and carry your puck towards goal. Tackle opponent and dodge yourself to score epic goal.

Features of Ice Hockey Strike

¥ Best AI with challenging gameplay
¥ Use your reflexes to tackle opponent player
¥ Epic Ice Hockey Strike challenge
¥ Score goals to upgrade your level
¥ Become a Diamond player in Ice Hockey
¥ Upgrade your team
¥ Unlock Balls & new Hockey arena
